title: Men of the footplate
brief_description: Presents the work of ayoung man wishing to join the railway. Harry begins working at British Railway as a cleaner. He learns the names and functions of the steam locomotion parts he cleans. His eagerness leads him to progress to the role of fireman, hoping to eventually become a driver. Commentary by Frank Phillips.
